head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RIVA, BETTY SHALER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RIVA, BETTY SHALER

block.p: RIVA-Betty Shaler. On Friday, July 14, 2000, of Short Hills, NJ. Beloved wife of H. L. Riva, M.D. Devoted mother of Barbara B. Coates, Richard D. Riva, D.D.S., Jeffrey F. Riva, Robert E. Riva, William Denning Riva, Mary Anne Martin, Suzanne Riva, M.D., and the late John M. Riva, M.D., and Elizabeth Jane Riva. Dear sister of the late Barbara Shaler Snyder. Also survived by 26 grandchildren and six great-grandchildren. Relatives and friends are invited to attend the Memorial Mass at St. Rose of Lima Church, 50 Short Hills Ave., Short Hills, NJ, on Wednesday, July 19, at 10 AM. Interment Arlington National Cemetery, Arlington, VA. For information, The Jacob A. Holle Funeral Home, 2122 Millburn Ave, Maplewood, NJ 07040.
